org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact

Class DefaultGriffonClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact.AbstractGriffonClass
      • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.core.artifact.DefaultGriffonClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GriffonClass
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultGriffonControllerClass, DefaultGriffonModelClass, DefaultGriffonServiceClass, DefaultGriffonViewClass

    public class DefaultGriffonClass
extends AbstractGriffonClass
    A default implementation for Griffon classes that need to be registered and managed by a GriffonApplication, but don't need any special handling.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher (Grails 0.1), Andres Almiray
